subject: Re: Im new to the group and need info.
author: psi_research
full_text:
Hi David, if you do a search for "Audacity", you'll find links that 
will allow you to select the version that is correct for your operating 
system. It's totally free software and is popular with those who wish 
to record and analyze EVPs. It's got the noise reduction features that 
some find useful when wishing to reduce 60 Hz hum.

Regards, Bill Murphy

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "David Hogan" <hoodoodave54@...> wrote:
>
>  I have been recording evp's for over 3 years now and I think I have 
> heard it all, from a little girl that was raped " tore my cloths 
> off", "I was very scared" then " I died in the snow" to the same 
voice 
> that cusses me out every time I record. Now Im looking for a free or 
> very cheap audio program to help clean the recordings up to make them 
> clearer. any suggestions? thanks.
>
